channel.title: How od i make other players a admin?
channel.description: im using pimpscape and i change my friends character rights to 3 but its not workin!!what cna i do?anyone who helps with become admin of my serv!

item.title: How od i make other players a admin?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

they dont have to be logged in all u gotta do is go in the character file and where it says “player rights” change that number to:
0 for normal
1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for owner
then go to file and save

Read full topic
item.source: How od i make other players a admin?
